thread.title: Customer leaves an epic review about his experience with hair removal gel (5 Photos)
thread.title_full: Customer leaves an epic review about his experience with hair removal gel (5 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Customer leaves an epic review about his experience with hair removal gel (5 Photos)
text:
Amazon 
Being hairy comes with its positive and negatives. They have to watch out for hot glue, the sticky part of wristbands and bandaids that don’t stick. Being a guy that’s pretty hair these all hit a little too close to home. 
One guy on Amazon was struggling with the amount of hair on his rear end and decided to do something about it. A. Cheppell tried Veet for Men Hair Removal Gel Creme to remove the excess hair that was hindering his bathroom sit down time. Cheppell quickly learned the gel was a terrible idea. 
Cheppell left a hilarious and very detailed review on Amazon that quickly was awarded 5-stars. 2
